name: Deceit 2
description:
Deceit 2 is an immersive 6-9 player social deduction horror experience that can be played with friends or online via matchmaking. Your goal, escape the Ritual. But beware, two of your party have been corrupted by evil, hiding amongst you in plain sight, empowering the Ritual in order to sacrifice you to the Game Master's mysterious Benefactors. Band together, decipher allies from foes, but in this treacherous game, who truly stands by your side?

WHO CAN YOU TRUST?

The Innocent's strength lies in unity. Suspect an Infected amongst you? Unite to initiate the Banishing Ritual. But tread carefully; a wrong accusation leads to even greater mistrust in your ranks. Engage with the mysterious Peddler, trading souls for invaluable tools to aid your quest, navigate the haunting In-Between, all to secure your escape.


MANOEUVRE & MISLEAD

As an Infected, exploit the Ritual Site's Weak Points and tear the fabric of reality asunder. Once breached, all are thrust into The In-Between, a shadowy realm where the Infected's true power becomes unleashed. Here, they sow chaos, hunting and destroying the Innocent. Yet, if caught in the real world, their reign of terror can be halted.


HUNT & BE HUNTED

When The In-Between engulfs all, the race to escape intensifies. Evade the supercharged Infected, whose very presence warps reality. But remember, the Ritual demands sacrifice. Who amongst you will pay the ultimate price?


BOUNDLESS BETRAYAL

Deceit 2 offers an unparalleled social sandbox experience. At its heart lies the art of deception. Observe, analyse, and deduce, but remember, with ever-changing tools and terrains, strategy is fluid.


Dive into Deceit 2 - where trust is fragile, and every choice could be your last. Will you emerge victorious or become yet another victim to the Ritual of Deceit?

DARE YOU ENTER THE RITUAL?

Millhaven Asylum, 1979: A chilling occult ritual claims the lives of a once-renowned family, leaving only whispers of the horror behind. This unsolved enigma lay dormant until the audacious Truth Seekers Anonymous dared to unravel it. Now, you're ensnared, a pawn in the sinister Ritual of Deceit, orchestrated by the malevolent Game Master.
